snippet.title: Bigger Than Me - [EARLY TEASER]
snippet.description:
Early teaser for Bigger Than Me.

Bigger Than Me is a point & click graphic (mis)adventure about Max, a young man full of uncertainties with a peculiar problem: he becomes giant everytime he hears the word 'FUTURE'. Puzzles, minigames and existential crises spiced up with humor in a story about growing up in a world that seems to be ending.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1882690/Bigger_Than_Me/

Follow the development on Twitter: https://twitter.com/DeadPixelGames_

All rights reserved.
